title: z-index
body:
Is there any concept like  z-index  in SkiaSharp? 
thank you

comments.author: Nyrest
mattleibow
comments.body:
This is a feature outside the scope of skia/SkiaSharp.

As Nyrest shows, you can create your own or maybe see if there is a library/nuget that does this and more advanced drawing things on top of skia.
